documentId.description: The unique document ID for the registration associated with the note.

documentRegistrationNumber.description: The unique document registration number for the registration associated with the note.

documentDescription.description: The description of the document type.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR system and included in a response, the date and time the registration is created in the system in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.

effectiveDateTime.description: The note effectiveDateTime is the date and time the unit note is effective. If not included in the request it will set to the registration timestamp. For some document types it may be in the past. It is in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.

expiryDateTime.description: For CAU, CAUC, CAUE document types, the date and time of the unit note expiry. The date and time in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.

status.description: The status of the unit note, set by the system and included in API responses.

destroyed.description: True if the unit note has been destroyed. Set by the system and included in API responses.

cancelledDocumentType.description: Conditionally included with the NCAN document type as the document type for the unit note registration that has been cancelled.

cancelledDocumentDescription.description: Conditionally included with the NCAN document type as the document type description for the unit note registration that has been cancelled.

cancelledDocumentRegistrationNumber.description: Conditionally included with the NCAN document type as the unique document registration number for the unit note registration that has been cancelled.

nonResidentialOther.description: For EXNR document types where nonResidentialReason is OTHER, provide a brief reason description.

nonResidentialReason.description: Only include and required for EXNR document types as the reason for the non-residential exemption.
